basics.name: Ruchir Attri
basics.label: Data scientist
basics.summary: An data scintist and AI enthusiast. I enjoy learning and implementing new stuff.

work.name: Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce
work.summary: Interned at the Decision Science team at CIBC. I worked on a project to characterize credit clients based on their overall banking behavior.

work.name: Accenture
work.summary: Worked on implementing NLP models for detection of Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in documents. Applied XGBoost to improve the overall detection framework of the NLU engine.

education.institution: Sauder School of Business, University of British Columbia
